title: Disconets only in lol
body:
Hoi, I have a annoying problem.
Since a few weeks when I play LoL, I get a lot of "picture to picture" moving, while lol says I have a 32 ms ping. 
If I disconect and reconect, same shit is happening. 
if I start a new game on a other account, everything works as expected.
Its like the one game I'm in is hexed or something?

replies.body:
Let's start with updating a couple network settings to see if that gets you a little better connection with our servers. Check out the [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) for the steps on Port Forwarding and how you can configure your DNS settings. 

If that doesn't help, describe this "picture to picture" moving thing a little better, as I'm not entirely sure what this means.

Okay, I got a good score on this test.
I mean  with "picture on picture" actually what I said. 
It randomly starts to only show the happening in pictures. (no fps drops or what ever)
If i reconect, it shows me a 30 ms ping. Ingame too, but its like a 4 k mps  ping. 
Hope you understand ;(

Edit:
Btw can't do something on the router because its not mine.
But it worked until like 1,5 months
